metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: The mode value is the value that appears the most number of times.
content.html: The mode value is the value that appears the most number of times.

content.text: R does not have a function to calculate the mode. However, we can create our own function to find it.
content.html: R does not have a function to calculate the mode. However, we can create our own function to find it.

content.text: If we take a look at the values of the wt variable (from the mtcars data set), we will see that the numbers 3.440 are often shown:
content.html: If we take a look at the values of the wt variable (from the mtcars data set), we will see that the numbers 3.440 are often shown:

content.text: Instead of counting it ourselves, we can use the following code to find the mode:
content.html: Instead of counting it ourselves, we can use the following code to find the mode:

content.code_html:
Data_Cars <- mtcars

names(sort(-table(Data_Cars$wt)))[1]

content.text: From the example above, we now know that the number that appears the most number of times in mtcars wt variable is 3.44 or 3.440 lbs .
content.html: From the example above, we now know that the number that appears the most number of times in mtcars wt variable is 3.44 or 3.440 lbs.
